title: Monitoring of petroleum industry information
context: ยง486B-1.5 Monitoring of petroleum industry information. The public utilities commission or the department of business, economic development, and tourism shall refer to the attorney general any matter that is a violation of this chapter that is discovered in the performance of its duties pursuant to chapter 486H or 486J. [L 2007, c 182, ยง1; am L 2013, c 259, ยง2]
